data.actual_result: Icon moves to the left and shows an green circle on hang up
data.expected_result: Icon is still, and no Green icon
data.short_description: [Overlay] When calling / in a call with someone the hang up button oddly moves closer to the Transparency button as well as showing a Green circle when you hang-up
data.steps_to_repro: - Open game with overlay - Call someone in DM (and keep an eye on the Phone icon) - Notice it moves - Hang up, Notice the Green circle for a half second. (This is meant for when a user is already in a call)
